WorkPlace.Name: Eurojob Denmark ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Vi er et danskejet vikarbureau med mere end 15 års erfaring fra vikarbranchen.
Vi hjælper firmaer i hele Danmark med at rekruttere kompetente medarbejdere fra andre EU-lande - til både vikariater og fastansættelse.
De fleste af vores kunder kontakter os, fordi de søger dygtige og stabile medarbejdere og den bedste måde at finde disse er, ifølge os, gennem personlige samtaler. Inden vores kandidater kommer til en samtale, har vi sørget for at godkende deres CV og tjekke op på deres referencer.

HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
Vi er et danskejet vikarbureau med mere end 15 års erfaring fra vikarbranchen.
Vi hjælper firmaer i hele Danmark med at rekruttere kompetente medarbejdere fra andre EU-lande - til både vikariater og fastansættelse.
De fleste af vores kunder kontakter os, fordi de søger dygtige og stabile medarbejdere og den bedste måde at finde disse er, ifølge os, gennem personlige samtaler. Inden vores kandidater kommer til en samtale, har vi sørget for at godkende deres CV og tjekke op på deres referencer.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Butcher jobs available - pig slaughterhouse in 6700 Esbjerg - call +45 88448244
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Butcher jobs available in a pig slaughterhouse (carving/ boning) in 6700 Esbjerg area - to apply, fill in your CV HERE or call us at +45 88448244 - Monday to Thursday - 9:00 to 15:00, and Friday - 9:00 to 13:00.

Requirements:

  • a minimum of 2-year experience is required to apply for this job
  • good experience using the knife and carving the carcass from A to Z
  • experience making meat products (salami, sausages, etc.) represents an advantage.

Starting date:

  • as soon as possible.

Salary:

  • 155,10 - 169,08 kr./hour brutto
  • 13,9% - salary supplement
  • netto salary - aprox. 2.500€/ month for 160 working hours
  • 5 weeks per year - paid holiday. 

Schedule:

  • working hours are from 7:00 to 15:00 (with 1 hour break), Saturdays and Sundays free.

Accommodation:

  • Eurojob Denmark may help with temporary accommodation for up to 6 months
  • The accommodation costs ~ 3,000 kr./ month (approx. 400 €), utilities included - each person has their own room and shares the bathroom and kitchen with the others
  • The value of the rent will be automatically deducted from the salary at the end of the month. No payment in advance or deposit.

Transportation to work:

  • Eurojob Denmark can provide a car, shared with other colleagues, for a period of up to 6 months; the car can be used for both business and personal use
  • The car rent is ~ 1,500 kr./ month / person (approx. 200 €)
  • Fuel cost will be shared by those who use the car.

Eurojob Denmark may provide assistance for registration to SIRI and SKAT.

To apply, fill in your CV HERE or call us at +45 88448244 - Monday to Thursday - 9:00 to 15:00, and Friday - 9:00 to 13:00.
